meanings.definition: A person who is indifferent or apathetic towards something.
meanings.sent1: The pococurante didn't care about the outcome of the game.
meanings.sent2: She was known as a pococurante when it came to politics.
meanings.sent3: The pococurante attitude of the cat towards the new toy was amusing.
meanings.sent4: His pococurante demeanor in the face of danger was like a stone.
meanings.sent5: The pococurante student's lack of interest in learning was evident.

meanings.definition: Showing a lack of concern or interest.
meanings.sent1: The pococurante response from the audience surprised the speaker.
meanings.sent2: She had a pococurante attitude towards the upcoming exam.
meanings.sent3: His pococurante behavior towards his own safety was quite amusing.
meanings.sent4: The pococurante sky seemed indifferent to the chaos below.
meanings.sent5: The pococurante plant didn't seem to mind the lack of water.
